text: pasuva viniścaya dinadī nam, ohu ovunva avaman kara “(oba, obagē devivarunva) mā haṭa samānayan yayi (pavasā, viśvāsavantayin samaga) oba tarka karamin siṭiyā noveda? ēvā kohēda?”yi vimasanu æta. ē avasthāvēdī adhyāpana gnānaya denu læbūvan “ada dina avamānayada, vipatada niyata vaśayenma pratikṣēpa karamin siṭi ayaṭayi” yayi pavasannāha
